sections.purpose: To dry samples under vacuum and controlled temperature.
sections.scope: Applicable to moisture removal in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Place the sample on the tray inside the oven.
Close and latch the door to ensure an airtight seal.
Switch ON the vacuum pump and open the vacuum valve.
Once the vacuum is reached, set the heating temperature.
Monitor the process and turn OFF the heat when finished.
Slowly bleed air into the chamber before opening the door.
Remove the sample and clean the chamber interior.
precautions: Bleed the vacuum very slowly to avoid sample flying around.
Do not dry materials that release corrosive or explosive vapors.
Check the door gasket for proper sealing.
Monitor the temperature to prevent overheating of sensitive samples.
Ensure the vacuum pump is properly maintained.
